name: Crab Invasion
description:
(THIS GAME IS FOR WINDOWS ONLY)

Help the player to avoid the crabs from getting away from the ocean by using the power of your net! Catch as many as you can to prove how worthy you are as a crab catcher!

This game was intentionally created and is made for fun for the "Game Jam" I joined. I hope you like the ugly and weird art! ;D 

Instructions:

(A) - to go left and to face the net where the player should catch.

(D) - to go right and to face the net where the player should catch.

(W) - to go up and to face the net where the player should catch.

(S) - to go down and to face the net where the player should catch.

or use the Arrow keys!

(Space bar) - to catch the crabs.
